briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety of GSK Biologicals' Combined Measles-mumps-rubella Vaccine in Volunteers, Seven Years of Age and Older
officialTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Combined Measles-mumps-rubella Vaccine in Subjects Seven Years and Older (209762)

interventions.name: Merck's M-M-R速II, Measles, Mumps, and Rubella Virus Vaccine

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of GSK's trivalent MMR (Priorix速), comparing it to Merck"s MMR vaccine (M-M-R速II), which is approved for use in the US.
